knimeNode.name: Difference Checker
knimeNode.shortDescription: Checks if the two input tables are the same.

fullDescription.intro: This node is used for the testing and compares the output of the workflow with a stored persistent "golden" file and thrwos an exception if the two tables are not equal.

dataIn.name: Datatable with the output of the workflow

ports.dataIn: Datatable with the output of the workflow
